bookinfo.title: Policy Administration Guide
bookinfo.subtitle: Security-Enhanced Linux for aspiring Security Policy Administrators

abstract.para: Security-Enhanced Linux is to a Linux Security Specialist what a scalpel is to a Surgeon. To effectively maintain SELinux security policy one requires knowledge on topics of security, Linux, and modern computing environments. This document is for aspiring Security-Enhanced Linux Policy Administrators that do not necessarily possess the aforementioned knowledge, but that want in-depth exploration on the topic of SELinux policy administration.
